en.welcome: Hello, you are in the photo editor.
en.choice_photo_give: You have chosen a photo along the path: %s
en.choice_sure: Are you sure about the choice? yes/no
en.mode_choice:
Choose mode
1) Meme mode
2) Photo mode
3) General mode
4) Exit the program
en.meme_mode:
Choose a filter
1) Text
2) Grandpa Inside
3) Barbie
4) Shakalify quality
en.photo_mode:
Choose a filter
1) Blur
2) Inversion
3) Cells
en.all_mode:
Choose a filter
1) Text
2) Grandpa Inside
3) Barbie
4) Shakalify quality
5) Blur
6) Inversion
7) Cells
en.desc_ded_inside: Turns the image black and white
en.desc_barbi: Gives the picture a pinkish tone
en.desc_shukal: Makes the image resolution extremely poor
